obfuscation: Do myself find for instance a guard of honor to receive me; no, yet no, the town illuminated; no, yet no; refreshment provided; and no, and no, and royal salute fired; and no, and no, and triumphal arches erected, no, no, yet bells set ringing; and no; yes-- one-- the Visitors ' and I rang it me personal.

obfuscation: It 's not enough; it 's not enough; and upon my honour myself 'm very sorry but you see I was brought up in gondola and my ideas inside politeness are confined to it took off my cap to my passengers when they tip me; and that 's all very well in its way but it 's not enough.
original: It is   not enough! It is not enough! Upon my honour, I'm very sorry; but you see, I was   brought up in a gondola, and my ideas of politeness are confined   to taking off my cap to my passengers when they tip me. That's all very well in its way, but it is not enough.
